variables.name: NAMESPACE
variables.comment:
* The name space of the "text" feature.
     *
     * This needs to move to DeviceConfig constant.

variables.name: ENABLE_NEW_CONTEXT_MENU
variables.comment: * Whether we use the new design of context menu.

variables.name: KEY_ENABLE_NEW_CONTEXT_MENU
variables.comment: * The key name used in app core settings for {@link #ENABLE_NEW_CONTEXT_MENU}.

variables.name: TEXT_ACONFIGS_FLAGS
variables.comment: * List of text flags to be transferred to the application process.

variables.name: TEXT_ACONFIG_DEFAULT_VALUE
variables.comment:
* List of the default values of the text flags.
     *
     * The order must be the same to the TEXT_ACONFIG_FLAGS.

methods.name: public static String getKeyForFlag(@NonNull String flag)
methods.comment: * Get a key for the feature flag.

methods.name: public static boolean isFeatureEnabled(@NonNull String flag)
methods.comment: * Return true if the feature flag is enabled.

methodNames: public static String getKeyForFlag(@NonNull String flag)
public static boolean isFeatureEnabled(@NonNull String flag)
